title: University Research API System
shortDescription: Scalable API system for university research data management
longDescription: A robust and scalable API system developed for Dokuz Eyl√ºl University to manage research data and facilitate various university projects. The system supports multiple database technologies and provides comprehensive data management capabilities. Includes advanced caching, load balancing, and security features.
features: Advanced caching with Redis for optimal performance

title: BLE Sensor Integration Mobile App
shortDescription: React Native app with Bluetooth Low Energy sensor integration
longDescription: A sophisticated mobile application built with React Native that utilizes Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology to connect with various sensors and IoT devices. The app provides real-time data visualization, sensor calibration, data logging, and cloud synchronization capabilities. Designed for research and industrial applications.
features: Real-time data visualization with interactive charts

title: Enterprise Web Solutions (.NET & Angular)
shortDescription: Custom enterprise web applications for various clients
longDescription: A collection of enterprise-grade web applications developed for various clients during freelance work. These applications include CRM systems, inventory management platforms, and business process automation tools. All solutions are built with modern technologies and follow enterprise best practices for security, scalability, and maintainability.
features: Enterprise-grade CRM and inventory management systems
Business process automation and workflow management
Advanced security and role-based access control
Modern Angular frontend with responsive design

title: CreateGarden
longDescription: A comprehensive garden management application built with TypeScript that helps users plan, manage, and track their gardening activities. Features include plant cataloging, growth tracking, watering schedules, and seasonal planning. The application provides an intuitive interface for both novice and experienced gardeners.
features: Comprehensive plant cataloging and database management
Seasonal planning and crop rotation suggestions
User-friendly interface for gardeners of all levels
Weather integration for optimal gardening decisions

title: Timer App
shortDescription: Interactive timer application with multiple timer modes
longDescription: A versatile timer application featuring multiple timer modes including pomodoro, countdown, and stopwatch functionalities. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a clean and intuitive interface with customizable settings, notifications, and session tracking capabilities.

title: Video Script Generator
shortDescription: AI-powered Python tool for generating video scripts
longDescription: An intelligent Python application that generates video scripts using natural language processing and AI techniques. The tool analyzes input topics and creates structured, engaging video scripts with proper formatting, timing suggestions, and scene descriptions. Perfect for content creators and video producers.
features: AI-powered script generation using OpenAI API
Natural language processing for topic analysis
Structured script formatting with timing suggestions
Flask web interface for easy script generation
Content optimization for different video platforms

title: Smart Office Management System
shortDescription: Complete office management solution with frontend and backend
longDescription: A comprehensive smart office management system that includes both frontend and backend components. The system manages office resources, employee scheduling, meeting room bookings, and facility management. Features include IoT integration, real-time monitoring, automated notifications, and comprehensive reporting.
features: Meeting room booking and availability tracking
IoT integration for smart facility monitoring
Real-time dashboard with live data updates

title: Raspberry Pi Sensor Network
shortDescription: IoT sensor network using Raspberry Pi and Python
longDescription: An IoT sensor network system built with Raspberry Pi devices and Python for environmental monitoring and data collection. The system includes multiple sensor types, real-time data streaming, cloud integration, and comprehensive analytics. Perfect for smart home, agriculture, or industrial monitoring applications.
features: Multiple sensor types for environmental monitoring
Real-time data streaming with MQTT protocol
Scalable architecture for multiple Raspberry Pi devices
SQLite database for local data storage

title: WatchList Application
shortDescription: Personal watchlist management app built with TypeScript
longDescription: A personal watchlist management application that allows users to track movies, TV shows, and other media content. Features include personalized recommendations, progress tracking, rating system, and integration with external APIs for content information. Built with modern TypeScript and React technologies.
features: Personal watchlist management for movies and TV shows
Personalized recommendations based on viewing history
External API integration for content information

title: Business Information Systems Analysis
shortDescription: C# application for business systems analysis and optimization
longDescription: A comprehensive business information systems analysis application developed in C# for academic and professional use. The system provides tools for analyzing business processes, identifying inefficiencies, and proposing optimization strategies. Includes data visualization, reporting, and recommendation engine capabilities.
features: Business process analysis and optimization tools
Crystal Reports integration for professional reporting
SQL Server database for data management

title: KodlamaIo Developer Platform
shortDescription: C# backend for developer learning and project management
longDescription: A comprehensive developer platform backend built with C# for the KodlamaIo learning ecosystem. The system handles user management, course content delivery, project submissions, and progress tracking. Features include automated testing, code review tools, and integration with various development tools.
features: Automated testing and code review tools

title: Python Selenium Automation Suite
shortDescription: Comprehensive web automation testing framework with Python
longDescription: A robust web automation testing framework built with Python and Selenium for comprehensive web application testing. The suite includes automated testing scenarios, cross-browser compatibility testing, performance monitoring, and detailed reporting capabilities. Perfect for QA automation and continuous integration pipelines.
features: Automated testing scenarios with pytest framework
Detailed reporting and test result analysis

title: Decision Support Systems
shortDescription: PHP-based decision support system for business analytics
longDescription: A comprehensive decision support system built with PHP for business analytics and data-driven decision making. The system provides advanced analytics, predictive modeling, data visualization, and reporting capabilities. Designed to help businesses make informed decisions based on historical data and trends.
features: Historical data analysis and trend identification
